titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the U of M presents ... : the 5 greatest games in Wolverine football history.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: U of M presents ... : the 5 greatest games in Wolverine football history.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: BHL copy: container signed to John Cook by Bob Ufer.

odd.head: Varying Form of Title
odd.p: Five greatest games in Wolverine football history

odd.head: Participant or Performer
odd.p: Owen Franks, Executive Producer; Rube Weiss, Director; Bob Ufer, Voice.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: 1902 Michigan vs Stanford (Rose Bowl) -- 1942 Michigan vs Notre dame -- 1948 Michigan vs USC (Rose Bowl) -- 1950 Michigan vs Ohio State (Snow Bowl) -- 1969 Michigan vs Ohio State -- 1971 Michigan vs Ohio State (live excerpt) -- Legend of "The Victors."

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: "After careful consideration and long hours of mind-searching, Don Canham, Fritz Crisler, Benny Oosterbaan, Will Perry, Bo Schembechler, and long-time U of M football announcer, Bob Ufer, have selected the following five classic games as Michigan's greatest..."--container.
